Key Match Events: Jon Thorsteinsson scored the winning goal for Iceland
Pre-Game Insights: England played their final warm-up game before Euro 2024 against Iceland
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate called the performance 'disjointed and disappointing'
Declan Rice emphasized the need for improvement and highlighted positive performances
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match marked Iceland's memorable win at Wembley
The defeat raised questions about England's preparation for Euro 2024
Others: The match was compared to historical England defeats, including the 7-1 loss to Hungary in 1954
